TopicTitle: New to Forum played KSP for a while

Articles.Content:
You may have seen me on other forums. If haven't here is an over view for you.

Point 1: I have a hobby in model rocketry. I don't do the liquid rockets but do powerful solid fuel rockets.

Point 2: I'm currently studying aerospace engineering.

Point 3: Yes I like Pokemon, I like Kerbins, I like Pokemon Kerbins.

Point 4: My biggest accomplishment so far in KSP would be a tie between close Sun orbit science station and a "space station" orbiting Duna. (Kurt Kermin is the only one on board.)

Point 5: Terrible at docking or even getting something into docking position while in orbit.

Point 6: My version of a fairy Your version of a fairy (Imagine the karkin)

Point 7: That gif made you skip down to the bottom of this list.

Point 8:

Point 9: Hope you enjoy my ram space :3 (idk I know very little about computer engineering.)

Yeah, docking can be tricky. Watching youtubers like Kurtjmac and Scott manley can help, but the best advice for improving is just to practice in low Kerbin orbit. Hi Capt'n Skunky! (Guy that will most likely be posting below me)
